member.name: IDelayedPropertyStoreFactory.GetDelayedPropertyStore
member.summary: Gets an interface object, as specified.
member.param: The GPS_XXX flags that modify the store that is returned. See .

param.name: dwStoreId
param.para: The property store ID. Valid values are.

member.param: A reference to the desired IID.
The address of an interface pointer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDelayedPropertyStoreFactory
member.summary: Exposes a method to create a specified object in circumstances where property access is potentially slow.
